name: nudnik
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an annoying or boring person, especially someone who is always criticizing or complaining: He earned himself the reputation of being a nudnik and a pedant. What makes him such a nudnik, such a pest?
More examplesFewer examplesMelvin, you are such a nudnik!He is painted as a nudnik simply because he's into golf and finance.He plays a grandiose, macho nudnik with a raging ego and a hair-raising sense of grievance.
